name: Motion JPEG Video Codec
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Bitstream encoding for video in which each frame is compressed using the JPEG still-image compression algorithm. Taken as a sequence, the series of frames represent the source video.
